title: CIA Boss' 1947 Diary Sparks UFO Bombshell as 'Certain Papers' Sent to White House Emerge
description: CIA Director Hillenkoetter's 1947 diary reveals sensitive White House papers, suggesting early UFO programmes and controlled government action.

title: Bill Maher Guest Claims US Recovered Alien Craft With Bodies Inside In On-Air Bombshell
description: Bill Maher's guest reveals shocking claims of US recovery of alien craft with bodies inside, sparking debate over UFO cover-ups and government secrecy.

title: The UAP incident shows systemic erosion of academic integrity
description: Academic freedom—the right to teach, study, pursue knowledge or research without unreasonable interference—is often perceived through a narrow lens in our country.

title: UFO Applauds NPP Aspirants for Signing Peace Pact Ahead of Internal Elections
description: News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Isaac Kofi Dzokpo, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/ufo-applauds-npp-aspirants-for-signing-peace-pact-ahead-of-internal-elections/The Universal Friendship Organisation Ghana (UFO) has commended the leadership of the New Patriotic Party (NPP) for its meticulous preparations toward the party’s internal elections scheduled for January 31, 2026. In a press release issued in Accra on January 26, 2026, the organisation praised the NPP for its commitment to democratic processes and the measures [...] News Ghana, Latest Updates and Breaking News of Ghana, Isaac Kofi Dzokpo, https://www.newsghana.com.gh/ufo-applauds-npp-aspirants-for-signing-peace-pact-ahead-of-internal-elections/

title: Stanford Scientist Claims CIA Agents Suffered 'Fried' Brains During UAP Investigations
description: Stanford scientist Dr Gary Nolan reveals shocking CIA UAP research, describing brain injuries as if 'their brains looked fried'
